Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to requirements for a building owner to refuse to renew a lease under the real estate industry stabilization code
Summary: Relates to requirements for a building owner to refuse to renew a lease under the real estate industry stabilization code; requires the owner of a building to be demolished to prove that such owner has the financial ability to complete demolition of the building.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-511, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requirements for a building owner to refuse to renew a lease when the building is to be demolished
